notes: DTC ecommerce role — significant domain mismatch with healthcare background. Checkout Champ is listed as essential.

requirements_matched: Engineering leadership and structured process management experience
High ownership mindset with revenue accountability
Quick problem-solving with high technical standards
requirements_partial: Multi-brand management (has multi-tenant architecture, not DTC multi-brand)
Internal dashboard or reporting tool development
High-growth environment background (startup experience at Perceptive)
Attribution and automation systems (has automation, not marketing attribution)
gaps: Page speed optimization and funnel stability
addressable_gaps: Multi-brand management could be positioned through multi-tenant architecture experience
hard_gaps: DTC/ecommerce operational experience — entire career is healthcare IT

GA4, pixel tracking — no marketing analytics experience
